AUTHOR: Aioxas
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing my cog. 
[p]help Horoscope should be enough. If not [p]help horo, [p]help tsujiura should.
NAME: horoscope
SHORT: Zodiac and Chinese Horoscope and Fortune Cookie cog
DESCRIPTION: You can check your love and daily horoscope, as well as chinese horoscope. Random fortune cookie included.
